name: FastingPlasmaGlucose
title: Fasting Plasma Glucose
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains lab tests that are specific to measuring fasting plasma glucose levels performed after at least an 8 hour fast, in order to evaluate whether a patient is at risk for diabetes.),(Data Element Scope: Fasting plasma or serum glucose tests after at least an 8-hr fast.),(Inclusion Criteria: Any lab tests performed to measure glucose levels using a specimen type of serum or plasma, and at least an 8 hour fast.),(Exclusion Criteria: Glucose lab tests that are perfomed after less than an 8 hour fast, or glucose lab tests performed on blood. Codes that are in "trial" status.)
